Package au.edu.anu.omhtk.util

Class JavaUtils

java.lang.Object
au.edu.anu.omhtk.util.JavaUtils
public class JavaUtils extends Object
Utilities to handle java specific files, e.g. jar files.

  • Method Details

    • getClassesInPackage

      public static DynamicList<Class<?>> getClassesInPackage​(String packageName)
      Get all classes contained in a package. Handles local classes, files, and jar entries transparently. Implementation from a java.sun.com forum, now lost since oracle overtook sun.
      Parameters:
      packageName - the package to search (dot-delimited hierarchical String)
      Returns:
      a list of Class objects.

    • getClassesInPackageTree

      public static DynamicList<Class<?>> getClassesInPackageTree​(String packageName)
      Get all classes contained in a package and all its sub-packages. Handles local classes, files, and jar entries transparently. Implementation from a java.sun.com forum, now lost since oracle overtook sun.
      Parameters:
      packageName - the package to search (dot-delimited hierarchical String)
      Returns:
      a list of Class objects.

    • getClassNameList

      public static List<String> getClassNameList()
      Returns all the classes found on the class path. Use with caution, returns a huge mess.
      Returns:
      a list of class names

    • fileForClass

      public static File fileForClass​(Class<?> theClass)
      Get the file matching a class. Uses the application ClassLoader to get the information.
      Parameters:
      theClass - the class to look for
      Returns:
      the file handle to the argument .class file

    • fileForClass

      public static File fileForClass​(String className)
      Get the file matching a class name. Uses the application ClassLoader to get the information.
      Parameters:
      className - the class name to look for
      Returns:
      the file handle to the argument .class file

    • sleep

      public static void sleep​(long ms)
      Pauses the current thread for a given amount of time.
      Parameters:
      ms - time in milliseconds
